text: Amelia Graciela Vargas Ipaneca (16 January 1928 â€“ 21 April 2019) was a Cuban actress and dancer. She lived and worked in Argentina. She starred in the comedy movies Arroz con leche (1950), The Phantom of the Operetta (1955) and Cleopatra Was Candida (1964). She was born in Havana. Vargas died in Buenos Aires on 21 April 2019. She was 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Argentine dancers Category:Movie actors Category:Actors from Havana Category:Television actors
title: Amelia Vargas
